channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Traffic island bollards and central lamp nearest to Street lamp column 18 Wickham Road, 15th February
item.description:
Sorry couldn’t see asset numbers for bollard or traffic island lamp … but it is the one nearest to street lamp column No 18. Both bollards and central lamp on pole not on at night. You may want to get a ‘night scout ‘ out as there are several other sets of traffic bollards and central lamps in the vicinity of this one that are also NOT on at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Wickham Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip hazard. Paving slab loose and cracked, 15th February
item.description:
This is the 4th time these slabs have been up and ‘repaired’ now they need to be replaced. Thames water was last here 2 months ago, 13/12/2025 and they have patched holes and cracked the slabs. This is a trip hazard and an accident waiting to happen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Chase, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This is the 3rd time this week this has happened, 15th February
item.description:
The road service people did attend and cleaned the drain but it's still flooding, It's coming over the pavement and almost reaching the houses, this needs fixing as a matter of urgency. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merlin Road, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing public bin, 15th February
item.description:
As usual, this green bin is overflowing, with dog poo bags and a green waste sack scattered underneath it. Think this location could do with a larger bin as it seems to get full very quickly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain hole blocked, road close to flooding, 15th February
item.description:
The drain hole outside 86 warren road is blocked and the road is close to flooding. Please could this be rectified urgently due to the amount of rain we are having.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 15th February
item.description:
Various household items dumped on the green by the car park.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): The Vista, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass on pavement, 15th February
item.description:
A bottle has smashed and been left on the pavement. Could be hazardous to kids or pets.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 204 - 212, High Street, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please remove broken recycling box, 15th February
item.description:
Recycling box is broken and on the footpath. It has been here a while. Please can you dispose.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Laburnum Way, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping behind Calico House/Marriott, 15th February
item.description:
There has been waste lying directly being the Residence Inn (although the land does not belong to them) for months. It looks to be flytipping. The waste has been lying exposed for several months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): City Walk, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Concrete bollard needs resetting again, 15th February
item.description:
Looks like someone’s bashed into the bollard again

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2a, Glengarry Road, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Broken kerb stone, 15th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parish Lane, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Car seats dumped on pavement, 15th February
item.description:
Two car seats flytipped on public footpath in front of the scrap metal business. Not sure if they're intended for scrap metal, but they've been left there on a Sunday when the business isn't open.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Green Lane, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking, 15th February
item.description:
There are illegally parked cars blocking the left traffic filter at the traffic lights at the junction of Crown Dale and Beulah Hill. This happens every day during no parking hours.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beulah Hill, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: SORN vehicle parked on public road, 15th February
item.description:
Grey Peugeot RJ62 OHB SORN registered parked on public road. Car has been parked there for around 10 months without being moved. Car is parked opposite 87 Northcote Road, Sidcup DA14 6PS. Car is taking up a parking space that are valuable to residents on this road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 85, Northcote Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking, 15th February
item.description:
Cars parked on pavement, across cycle lane, in bus stop and on zebra crossing Daily Seen at 10.30am

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 621, Hertford Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Suitcases and other flytipped items, 15th February
item.description:
More flytipped in the usual place, next to the railway bridge on Green Lane. Three huge suitcases and other items. Happens every week here, if not more often.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Penge, Greater London
